statements: DELETE FROM occupancy_data WHERE room_id = 101 AND timestamp = '2022-01-10 08:00:00';
DELETE FROM occupancy_data WHERE timestamp <= '2022-01-15 12:00:00' AND room_id = 102;
DELETE FROM occupancy_data WHERE room_id = 101 AND timestamp > '2022-01-01 08:00:00';
DELETE FROM occupancy_data WHERE id = 1 AND occupancy_timestamp = '2022-10-10 08:00:00';
DELETE FROM Occupancy_Data WHERE room_number = 101 AND occupancy_status = FALSE;
DELETE FROM Cooling_Schedule WHERE cooling_end_time < '2022-08-31' AND room_number = 201;
DELETE FROM heating_schedule WHERE room_name = 'Living Room' AND temperature > 70;
DELETE FROM OccupancyData WHERE timestamp = '2023-01-15 08:00:00' AND room_id = 101;
DELETE FROM RoomDetails WHERE room_name = 'Living Room' OR room_area > 50;
